tag.description: Create a new release from given tag.

target.description: Target branch or full commit SHA (default: main branch).

files.description: A list of asset files may be given to upload to the new release.

draft.description: Save the release as a draft instead of publishing it

prerelease.description: Mark the release as a prerelease

discussion-category.description: Start a discussion of the specified category

repo.description: Select another repository using the [HOST/]OWNER/REPO format

generateNotes.description: Automatically generate title and notes for the release
